articles.author: Jacqueline Howard, CNN
articles.title: Eli Lilly's antibody therapy helps prevent Covid-19 in nursing homes, drugmaker says - CNN
articles.description: Eli Lilly and Company's monoclonal antibody combination therapy helped prevent symptomatic Covid-19 infection among nursing home residents and staff in a Phase 3 trial, the company announced on Thursday.
